defaults.description: Carrier-grade cloud telephony for India—SIP trunks, DID numbers, predictive dialer, call recording, AI transcription, AI agents and AI receptionist. TRAI-compliant infrastructure.

/.title: Cloud Telephony & AI Calling Platform for India
/.description: Callvia powers SIP trunks, DID numbers, dialer, recording and AI calling—built for call centers, enterprises and partners with compliant India-ready infrastructure.

/solutions.title: Solutions for Call Centers, Small Businesses & Partners
/solutions.description: Choose the right setup for your team—CallFlo Suite for call centers, AI Receptionist for inbound enquiries, and Partner tools for white-label telecom services.

/solutions/callflo-suite.title: CallFlo Suite for Call Centers & Enterprises
/solutions/callflo-suite.description: High-volume calling stack: SIP trunks + DID numbers + predictive dialer + recording + transcription + AI agents—built for performance, monitoring and scale.

/solutions/ai-receptionist.title: AI Receptionist for Small Businesses in India
/solutions/ai-receptionist.description: Never miss inbound calls. Callvia AI Receptionist answers enquiries, captures details and routes intelligently—ideal for clinics, salons, hotels and local services.

/solutions/partners.title: Partner Program for White-Label Telecom Services
/solutions/partners.description: Launch your own telecom offering with a reseller panel, wallet & billing, controls, APIs and white-label capabilities—built on compliant calling infrastructure.

/products.title: Products: SIP, DID, Dialer, Recording & AI Calling
/products.description: Explore Callvia products—SIP trunks, DID numbers, predictive dialer, call recording, AI transcription, AI agents, AI receptionist and WhatsApp automation.

/products/sip-trunks.title: SIP Trunks in India for Call Centers & Enterprises
/products/sip-trunks.description: Carrier-grade SIP trunking for inbound/outbound calling. Scale concurrent channels, integrate with your stack, and run reliable voice operations in India.

/products/did-numbers.title: DID Numbers in India (Virtual Numbers)
/products/did-numbers.description: Pan-India DID numbers for inbound calling—fast activation, routing and control. Ideal for businesses that want a dedicated business number in India.

/products/ai-agents.title: AI Voice Agents for Calling & Automation
/products/ai-agents.description: Programmable AI voice agents for repetitive inbound queries and workflows. Automate conversations, qualify leads and handoff to humans when needed.

/products/ai-transcription.title: AI Call Transcription for QA & Monitoring
/products/ai-transcription.description: Transcribe calls for quality, compliance and insights. Track keywords, agent performance and conversation outcomes across your calling operations.

/products/call-recording.title: Call Recording for Compliance & Quality
/products/call-recording.description: Record inbound and outbound calls with secure storage and easy access for audits, dispute resolution and agent coaching—built for call center workflows.

/products/predictive-dialer.title: Predictive Dialer for Call Centers in India
/products/predictive-dialer.description: Boost agent productivity with a predictive dialer—reduce idle time, improve connect efficiency and scale outbound campaigns with monitoring and controls.

/products/ai-receptionist.title: AI Receptionist for Inbound Calls & Lead Capture
/products/ai-receptionist.description: An AI receptionist that answers calls 24×7, understands intent, captures details and routes intelligently—perfect for enquiry-heavy businesses in India.

/products/whatsapp-automation.title: WhatsApp Automation for Enquiries & Follow-ups
/products/whatsapp-automation.description: Automate WhatsApp templates and workflows for lead follow-ups, confirmations and notifications—designed to connect calling and messaging operations.

/pricing.title: Pricing Calculator for SIP, Dialer & AI Calling
/pricing.description: Estimate monthly cost based on call minutes and channels. Compare plans for SIP trunks, AI agents, transcription, recording, dialer and receptionist.

/features.title: Features: Routing, Monitoring, Billing, APIs & More
/features.description: IVR & call routing, real-time dashboards, monitoring  & controls, prepaid wallet & billing, webhooks, integrations and white-label capabilities.

/developers.title: Developers: APIs, Webhooks & Integration Docs
/developers.description: Build on Callvia with REST APIs and webhooks for call logs, routing, automation and billing. Integrate calling into your CRM and workflows.

/resources.title: Resources: Guides, Playbooks & Updates
/resources.description: Learn about SIP trunking, DIDs, dialers, call monitoring, AI receptionist workflows and compliance in India with practical implementation guides.

/about.title: About Callvia
/about.description: Callvia builds infrastructure-first calling with automation—helping call centers, businesses and partners run reliable, compliant voice operations in India.

/careers.title: Careers at Callvia
/careers.description: Join Callvia to build calling infrastructure and AI automation for India. Explore open roles across engineering, operations, sales and partnerships.

/reseller-program.title: Reseller Program: Start Your White-Label Calling Business
/reseller-program.description: Become a Callvia partner to resell SIP, DID and AI calling solutions with a reseller panel, billing tools and white-label support.

/contact.title: Contact Sales & Support
/contact.description: Talk to Callvia for demos, onboarding and partnerships. Tell us your use case—call center, small business AI receptionist, or reseller program.

/terms.title: Terms of Service
/terms.description: Review Callvia terms for using our calling platform, APIs and services, including acceptable use, billing terms and service limitations.

/privacy.title: Privacy Policy
/privacy.description: Learn how Callvia collects, uses and protects data across calling services, recordings, transcripts and platform usage—privacy and security first.

/compliance.title: Compliance: KYC, DND & Telecom Regulations
/compliance.description: Understand Callvia's compliance approach for KYC, call recording, DND and India telecom guidelines—built for regulated, high-volume operations.

/security.title: Security & Data Handling
/security.description: How Callvia secures calls, recordings and platform data—access controls, operational safeguards and best practices for enterprise-grade reliability.

/faq.title: FAQ: SIP, DID, AI Receptionist & Platform Setup
/faq.description: Answers to common questions about SIP trunks, DID numbers, predictive dialer, AI receptionist setup, onboarding, integrations and platform controls.

/status.title: System Status
/status.description: Check current system availability and incident updates for Callvia services.
